details: Deployed 'ShopUnit.tsx' component that injects Amazon affiliate cards into the movie grid based on the selected mood.
Added `shop_query` to all moods (e.g., 'Hustle' -> 'business books') and implemented deep linking to Amazon Search.
Added specific AI insight templates for new moods (Hustle, Dark, Romance).
System now attempts to monetize user intent beyond just movies (books, gear, collectibles) at index 7 of every grid.
